## Instructions

Complete the [Population Genetics Simulation](/labs/07HWE.html) assignment by following the instructions provided. Submit a link to your group repository here. 

## Grading

For full credit:
  * You should have at least one commit from each person in your group.
  * Your repository should contain the files `README.md` and `README.qmd`.
  * The README should contain documentation on the use and purpose of the functions and at lease one simulation of the consequences of a departure from HWE.
